text_importexport_content: Apa mutha kuitanitsa ndi kutumiza zolemba zanu.
text_help_content:
Zolemba ndi pulogalamu yosunga ndi kukonza zolemba.

Kuti mupange cholemba chatsopano, kapena chikwatu chatsopano, dinani chizindikiro cha "kuphatikiza": sankhani pakati pa cholembera ndi chikwatu, ikani mutuwo ndipo pamapeto pake okhutira, kenako dinani kusunga kuti musunge zosinthazo, kapena dinani kufufuta kuti muchotse cholembacho, kapena kubwerera kuti mudumphe zosinthazo koma sungani cholembacho.

Dinani batani "lotseguka" pafupi ndi notsi kuti mutsegule zomwe zikugwirizana .

Dinani batani "add" mkati mwa chikwatu kuti muwonjezere chinthu chatsopano.

Zolemba ndi mafoda onse, dinani batani "edit" kuti musinthe, dinani batani "bwererani" kuti musinthe malo ndi chinthu cham'mbuyomu, dinani batani "pitani patsogolo" kuti musinthe malo ndi chinthu chotsatira, dinani batani "pitani m'mwamba" kuti musunthire fodayo momwe ilili, kapena dinani batani "pita kunsi" kuti musunthire chinthucho mkati mwa chikwatu chotsatira.

Kuti mulowetse kapena kutumizira manotsi, dinani pachizindikiro cholowetsera / kutumiza. Zolemba zidzatumizidwa kapena kutumizidwa mu fayilo ya JSON yodziwika ndi pulogalamuyi. Mukamatumiza manotsi kuchokera fayilo, zolemba zaposachedwa zichotsedwa ndikulembedwanso.

Zolemba ndi Progressive Web Application, zomwe zikutanthauza kuti zimayenda mkati mwa msakatuli. Mukayiyika, pomwe zosatsegula sizikuwonetsedwa, imayendabe mkati mwa msakatuli. Zolembazo zimasungidwa mukasungidwe ka osatsegula komwe kuli zolembera.marcoparrone.com localStorage imagwira ntchito bwino ndi asakatuli a Chrome, Edge ndi Firefox. Masakatuli ena akhoza kuchotsa LocalStorage patapita nthawi. Android mwachisawawa imagwiritsa ntchito Chrome, Windows posintha Edge. Zomwe pakadali pano sizikuthandizidwa pazinthu za Apple. Ndi cholinga chothandizira kupewa kutayika kwa manotsi, akuti tikufuna kubwezera ndalama pogwiritsa ntchito "kutumiza" kwina, nthawi iliyonse mukasintha zina zomwe simukufuna kutaya.

Maumwini Onse Ndi Otetezedwa. KOMA OSALI MALIRE KU CHITSIMIKIZO CHAKUCHITITSA MACHITO, KUKHALA KWA CHOLINGA CHOFUNIKA NDI KUSAKHALA. OLEMBEDWA KAPENA OGWIRITSA MALAMULO ACHIKHALIDWE ADZAKHALIDWA POFUNA ZONSE, ZOCHITIKA KAPENA ZOCHITIKA ZINA, NGAKHALE KUCHITA KWA PANGANO, TORT KAPENA KANTHAWI KOMANSO, KUCHOKERA KU, KAPENA KAPENA KULUMIKIZANA NDI SOFTWARE KAPENA KUGWIRITSA NTCHITO KAPENA ZINTHU ZINA ZOPEREKA ZOTHANDIZA.
text_about_content2: UTUMIKI UNO UTHENGA NTHAWI ZONSE MUTHANDIZA KUMASULIRA KWAMBIRI NDI GOOGLE. GOOGLE ITSUTSA ZITSIMBIKITSO ZONSE ZOKHUDZANA NDI KUMASULIRA, KUFOTOKOZA KAPENA KUWONETSEDWA, KUPHATIKIZAPO ZITSANZO ZONSE ZA KUCHITIKA, KUKHULUPIRIKA, NDI ZINTHU ZONSE ZOTHANDIZA ZOKHUDZITSA NTCHITO, ZOKHUDZA CHOLINGA CHABWINO NDI CHINSINSI.
text_about_content3:
Pulogalamuyi yamasuliridwa kuti ikhale yosavuta kugwiritsa ntchito pulogalamu yomasulira yoyendetsedwa ndi Google Translate. Kuyesayesa koyenera kwachitika kuti kumasulira kolondola, komabe, palibe kumasulira kwadzidzidzi komwe sikungakhale koyenera kapena cholinga chake m'malo mwa omasulira anthu. Zomasulira zimaperekedwa ngati ntchito kwa ogwiritsa ntchito tsamba la marcoparrone.com, ndipo zimaperekedwa "monga momwe zilili." Palibe chitsimikizo chamtundu uliwonse, chofotokozedwa kapena chofotokozedwapo, chomwe chimapangidwa molondola, molondola, kapena molondola pamasuliridwe aliwonse ochokera ku Chingerezi kupita mchilankhulo china chilichonse. Zina (monga zithunzi, makanema, Flash, ndi zina zambiri) sizingamasuliridwe molondola chifukwa chakuchepa kwa pulogalamu yomasulira.

Malembo ovomerezeka ndi omwe Chingerezi ndi webusayiti iyi. Zolakwika zilizonse zomwe zidachitika mukutanthauzira sizikhala zomangika ndipo sizikhala ndi zotsatirapo zalamulo pakutsatira kapena kukwaniritsa. Ngati pangakhale mafunso okhudzana ndi kulondola kwa zidziwitso zomwe zili patsamba lawebusayiti, lembani mtundu wachingerezi webusayiti yomwe ili mtundu wovomerezeka.
